testcase.name: Input Component > Basic Rendering > should render an input element
Input Component > Basic Rendering > should have default type as text
Input Component > Basic Rendering > should have data-slot attribute
Input Component > Basic Rendering > should apply default CSS classes
Input Component > Props Handling > should accept and apply type prop
Input Component > Props Handling > should accept and apply value prop
Input Component > Props Handling > should accept and apply placeholder prop
Input Component > Props Handling > should accept and apply disabled prop
Input Component > Props Handling > should accept and apply name prop
Input Component > Props Handling > should accept and apply id prop
Input Component > Props Handling > should accept and apply aria-label prop
Input Component > Props Handling > should accept and apply aria-invalid prop
Input Component > Styling and CSS Classes > should merge custom className with default classes
Input Component > Styling and CSS Classes > should handle className prop as undefined
Input Component > Styling and CSS Classes > should apply focus-visible styles
Input Component > Styling and CSS Classes > should apply aria-invalid styles when aria-invalid is true
Input Component > Event Handling > should call onChange when input value changes
Input Component > Event Handling > should call onFocus when input is focused
Input Component > Event Handling > should call onBlur when input loses focus
Input Component > Event Handling > should call onKeyDown when key is pressed
Input Component > Event Handling > should not call onChange when disabled
Input Component > Input Types > should render email input correctly
Input Component > Input Types > should render number input correctly
Input Component > Input Types > should render password input correctly
Input Component > Input Types > should render search input correctly
Input Component > Input Types > should render file input correctly
Input Component > Controlled vs Uncontrolled > should work as uncontrolled component
Input Component > Controlled vs Uncontrolled > should work as controlled component
Input Component > Accessibility > should be focusable when not disabled
Input Component > Accessibility > should not be focusable when disabled
Input Component > Accessibility > should support aria-describedby
Input Component > Accessibility > should support aria-required
Input Component > Accessibility > should support required attribute
Input Component > Edge Cases > should handle empty string value
Input Component > Edge Cases > should handle null className
Input Component > Edge Cases > should handle very long values
Input Component > Edge Cases > should handle special characters in value
